descriptions.content: This resource analytically surveys various types of biblographical categories relevant to primary literature, secondary resources, and websites related to Tibet and the Himalayas. Each node has a short summary, and then links to THL and non-THL resources on the topic. Please contact thl@collab.itc.virginia.edu to contribute essays or other resources, all of which will be credited to you as the author. We also welcome feedback about the structure itself, or suggestions of new nodes.
descriptions.title: An Introduction to Bibliographic Classifications
